name: Twilight Memoria: Sun and Moon
description:
A story about Rucifar Demien, a child who live in a small village with his childhood friend Luna Silver. One day, they encountered a small bizarre phenomenon that will change their world.

This game has a unique ATB pseudo-action battle and a simple yet complex Crafting System (Alchemy System) with endless capabilities. Every material with give out a different result!

Here's the video of the battle system.

This game is stil UNDER DEVELOPMENT so we appreciate any feedback~

We're sorry if any of you still experiencing any bug or unbalanced system, since we're still searching for the perfect formula~

Cheers and happy playing~
